General.Name: Xiangcai Co Ltd
General.Description: Xiangcai Co., Ltd provides securities service in China. The company offers securities brokerage; securities investment consulting; financial advisors related to securities trading and securities investment activities; securities underwriting and sponsorship; securities self-operation; securities asset management; and margin financing and securities lending services. It also engages in the food processing, pharmaceuticals, waterproofing membranes production, and trading businesses. The company was formerly known as Harbin High-Tech (Group) Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Xiangcai Co., Ltd in September 2020. Xiangcai Co., Ltd was founded in 1994 and is based in Harbin, China.
General.Address: High-tech Industrial Development Zone, Harbin, China
